scenario_text.value:
You two again... I believe I’ve expressed my
intention loud and clear. I won’t go back.

But you didn’t say that, did you? You said
that you “can’t” come back.

Is something going on? If so, we can talk it
through and—
No need. Return to your other comrades.

...If you refuse to withdraw, then I shall
take leave myself.

Falcomon... I guess an apology isn’t enough
for him to forgive me.

Hey, Minoru... It doesn’t sound like he’s
actually mad at you or anything.

He may have a reason he can’t tell us. Let’s
follow him again and try asking him about it.

A reason he can’t tell us, huh? I can’t think
of anything.
